cn.title: ADD/EOS 交易竞赛获奖名单（第二期 8月9日 - 10日）

message.data: 2018 年 8 月8 日 16：00， 比特派 Bitpie 正式开通 ADD/EOS 交易对，为感谢平台用户的支持和信任，连同 ADD 同步上线交易大赛以及三重奖励，花样送好礼，详情可点击了解。
派银行已进行 ADD、CHL 糖果的发放，同时开通 ADD/EOS、CHL/EOS 交易对及开放 ADD 交易大赛，详情：点击
一、交易大赛赢壕礼！
其中交易竞赛活动，通过统计每日用户交易量进行排名，并发放奖励。现将第一期的交易竞赛即交易时间段为：8 月 9 日 16:00 – 10日16:00 的中奖明细公示如下：

奖励为：
第1名：50,000 ADD
第2名：20,000 ADD
第3名：10,000 ADD
第4-10名：每位用户 3,000 ADD
第11-50名： 每位用户500 ADD
中奖者均可获得100 ADD 奖励。
二、空投奖励人人乐！
恭喜中奖用户，交易活动仍在持续进行，欢迎大家前来参与！

温馨提示：
1.活动最终解释权归比特派 Bitpie 所有；
2.活动期间，如有恶意刷量行为，将取消参赛资格；
3.阳光奖的用户与实力奖的用户可以重叠；
4.活动结束后15个工作日内发放奖励。
5.活动排名每个工作日20:00前在 bitpie.com 官网更新展示，最终榜单活动结束后五个工作日内公布，最终榜单公布后三个工作日内无举报则按排名发放奖励。
6.数字资产是创新的投资产品，价格波动较大，请您理性判断自己的投资能力，审慎做出投资决策。
7. 以上时间均为香港时间（UTC+8）。

创建账户教程：点击
如果您在其它钱包有EOS账户，也可以导入比特派。导入教程：点击

比特派团队
2018年08月11日

Bitpie 社群：
新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“比特派钱包”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1

en.title: ADD/EOS Trading Competition Winner Lists (Day Two 9th -10th Aug.)

message.data: At 16:00 8th August, Bitpie listed the ADD/EOS trading pair in its built-in exchange. To extend the gratitude to our users’ trust and supports, Bitpie and ADD launched the trading competition of ADD/EOS with multiple rewards. For details, please click
I Daily Giveaway

The rewards are:
Top 1: 50,000 ADD
Top 2: 20,000 ADD
Top 3: 10,000 ADD
Top 4-10: 3,000 ADD per user
Top 11-50: 500 ADD per user

2.For the FIRST 100 traders whose trading volume (24h) exceed 100 EOS, 100 ADD giveaways for every 100-EOS-equivalent volume will be awarded pursuant to their TOTAL trading volume (buying plus selling). The winning UIDs are:133259＊,26410＊,277412＊
II Airdrop to Every ADD HODLers

The winning UIDs are:
222769＊,28176＊,31175＊
Congratulations to the winners! The competition is still ongoing. Welcome to join us!

Tips:
1.Bitpie reserves the right to cancel or amend the Competition or Competition Rules at our sole discretion.
2.Any intentional wash trading during the Competition period will not be tolerated and may result in disqualification.
3.Rewards will be issued within 15 working days after the competition.
4.The rankings will be updated on Bitpie.com before 20:00 (Hong Kong time) on each working day, and the final list will be published within FIVE working days after the end of the campaign. If no winners are reported within three working days after the final list is published, the list will be deemed as valid and final.
5.Digital assets are innovative investment products, and their prices fluctuate greatly. Please judge your investment ability rationally and make investment decisions prudently.
6.All the time above is Hong Kong Time (UTC+8).

How to Create a New EOS Account: Click
How to Import an Existing EOS Account to Bitpie: Click
Enjoy your trading!

Bitpie Team
August 11, 2018
